髵字的基本解释

髵
ér
〔髬髵〕见“
髬”。

髵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ér］
［《廣韻》如之切，平之，日。］
(1)多毛貌。
(2)颊毛。
(3)见“髬髵”。

髵字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【髟字部】　髵； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1453第42
【廣韻】如之切【集韻】【韻會】人之切【正韻】如支切，?音而。【說文】本作而。頰毛也。【註】今俗別作髵。【玉篇】多毛貌。亦作耏。　又【廣韻】髬髵，獸奮鬣貌。詳髬字註。

髵字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
髵字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ér］
["Guangyun" is like cut, flat, day. ]
(1) Hairy appearance.
(2) Cheek hair.
(3) See "髬髵".
髵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Haiji 1] [Xi Zi Department] 　髵; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1453 Page 42
[Guang Yun] Such as cutting [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Human cutting [Zheng Yun] such as branch cutting, sound and. [Said the text] This is the work. Cheek hair also. [Note] Don't make 髵 in modern folks. [Jade articles] Hairy appearance. Also known as 耏.　[Guangyun] 髬髵, the beast has a good appearance. Detailed notes on the characters.
